title: Ling Roberts: The Timeless Organizer

story.text: Ling stumbles upon a mysterious ancient clock in her basement, which grants her the power to manipulate small increments of time, helping her excel even further in her hobbies.
Ling tests her new powers by organizing a neighborhood clean-up incredibly efficiently, finishing what normally would take hours in mere minutes.
Encouraged by her success, Ling plans a local fundraiser. Using her powers, she coordinates everything perfectly, raising a record amount for the community park restoration.
Taking notice of her recent activities, a local reporter interviews Ling, who subtly uses her powers to squeeze the long interview into a brief chat, leaving more time for her community projects.
Ling discovers that her powers are starting to wane, possibly due to overuse. She decides to focus on organizing a massive community potluck with careful time management.
During the potluck, Ling's powers fade completely. However, she realizes the community's routine has improved dramatically because of her initial efforts and leadership.
Reflecting on her week, Ling feels proud knowing she's empowered her neighbors with or without her time-managing abilities. They organize a surprise party to celebrate her influence and spirit.

ending: Even without superpowers, Ling Roberts had always been a hero in her community.
